member.summary: Determines whether the object is equal compared to the specified object. A default comparison is used. Please see overloads.
member.returns: True if two objects are equal, false otherwise.

member.summary: Color type (IColor).

member.summary: Conversion codename. Not used. May be used for compatibility with EmguCV.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo.IsGenericColorSpace
member.summary: Returns if the color-space is generic (e.g. Color3, Color4...) or not. Conversion from non-generic and generic color-spaces may be casted (does not require data conversion).

member.summary: Number of channels that color has.

member.summary: Number of bytes per channel.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo.ChannelType
member.summary: Channel type. Only primitive types are supported.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo.Size
member.summary: Color size. Number of channels multiplied by channel size.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts
member.summary: Indicates what parts of color info should be compared.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts.Depth
member.summary: Checks color depth type

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts.Castable
member.summary:
Checks if one color can be casted to other.
One of the color infos must be Generic (or the same) and have the same number of channels and color channels must be the same type.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts.Default
member.summary: Checks color type and depth type (if it is true all other properties are equal as well)

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorConversionsExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for image color conversion.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorConversionsExtensions.Convert``2(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IImage,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the image from source to destination color and depth. Data may be shared if casting is used. To prevent that set to true.
member.param: Forces data copy even if a casting is enough.
If data copy is needed throws an exception.

member.summary: Converts the image from source to destination color and depth. Data may be shared if casting is used. To prevent that set to true.
member.param: Forces data copy even if a casting is enough.
If data copy is needed throws an exception.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for converting and casting an image to an array.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions.GetChannels(System.Array)
member.summary: Gets images (channels) for 2D/3D array. Any array that is not 2D/3D and its element is not a primitive type is not supported. (an exception is thrown)
member.returns: Channels. For 2D array output will consist of an single image.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions.SetValue``2(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Image{``0,``1},``1[0:,0:,0:])
member.summary: Sets pixels for an image from array. Array is converted to image channels first () An image and an array must have the same dimensions.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions.SetValue``1(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Image{Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Gray,``0},``0[0:,0:])
member.summary: Sets pixels for an image from array. Array is converted to image channels first (one and only channel) () An image and an array must have the same dimensions.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions.ToImage``2(``1[0:,0:,0:])
member.summary: Converts an array to an image. Data is copied. 2D array also supports data sharing

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions.ToImage``1(``0[0:,0:])
member.summary: Converts array to image (data is copied). Array elements must be primitive types.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions.AsImage``1(``0[0:,0:])
member.summary: Converts array to image (data is shared). Array elements must be primitive types.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ArrayToImageExtensions.ToImage``1(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts array to image (data is copied). Array elements must be primitive types.

member.summary: Contains extension methods for converting an image to an array representation.

member.summary: Converts image to 3D array.

member.summary: Converts gray image to 2D array.

member.summary: Contains extension methods for image value initialization.

member.summary: Sets each image byte to zero (using kernel function memset).

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ConditionalCopy
member.summary: Contains extension methods for copying image data by using masks.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ConditionalCopy.CopyTo``2(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Image{``0,``1},Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Image{``0,``1},Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Image{Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Gray,System.Byte})
member.summary: Copies values from source to destination image using mask. Destination values where mask == 0 are not erased!.
member.param: Mask. Color locations that need to be copied must be set to !=0 in mask.

member.summary: Copies values from source to destination image using mask. Destination values where mask == 0 are not erased!.
member.param: Mask. Color locations that need to be copied must be set to !=0 in mask.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage
member.summary: Represents the OpenCV's IplImage structure which enables OpenCV / EmguCV interoperability.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.IPL_DEPTH_SIGN
member.summary: Constant for signed data types.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.StructureSize
member.summary: Size of the structure

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ID
member.summary: Version, always equal 0

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.NumberOfChannels
member.summary: Number of channels. Most OpenCV functions support 1-4 channels.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.AlphaChannel
member.summary: Ignored by OpenCV (set to zero).

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ChannelDepth
member.summary: Channel depth in bits + the optional sign bit

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ColorModel
member.summary: Ignored by OpenCV. The OpenCV function CvtColor requires the source and destination color spaces as parameters.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ChannelSeq
member.summary: Ignored by OpenCV

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.DataOrder
member.summary: Interleaved or separate (not used) channel order.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.Origin
member.summary: Data origin: top-left or bottom-right (not used).

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.Align
member.summary: Alignment of image rows (4 or 8). (Ignored by OpenCV)

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.Width
member.summary: Image width

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.Height
member.summary: Image height

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ROI
member.summary: Region Of Interest (ROI). If not NULL, only this image region will be processed. It is always null if generic image is represented as OpenCV image.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.MaskROI
member.summary: Must be NULL in OpenCV.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ImageId
member.summary: Must be NULL in OpenCV.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.TileInfo
member.summary: Must be NULL in OpenCV.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ImageSize
member.summary: Image data size in bytes.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ImageData
member.summary: A pointer to the aligned image data.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.WidthStep
member.summary: The size of an aligned image row, in bytes.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.BorderMode
member.summary: Border completion mode, ignored by OpenCV.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.BorderConst
member.summary: Border completion mode, ignored by OpenCV.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IplImage.ImageDataOrigin
member.summary: A pointer to the origin of the image data (not necessarily aligned). This is used for image deallocation. During casting between generic image to OpenCV image it is set to null.

member.summary: Converts a pointer to an IplImage structure.

member.summary: Unsigned 1bit

member.summary: IplImage channel data order.

member.summary: Interleaved color channels.

member.summary: IplImage data origin.

member.summary: Data origin is located in the top-left corner.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter
member.summary:
Represents the main class for color and conversion. It uses search methods to find appropriate conversion paths.
Methods can be used as extensions.

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.GENERIC_COLOR_CAST_OFFSET
member.summary: To prevent paths like (Bgr, byte) => (Color3, byte) => (Hsv, byte), generic color conversions are weighted by arbitrary large weight.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.Initialize
member.summary: Builds a graph for added conversions (built-in conversion are added by default) and determines conversion paths by using Floyd-Warshall algorithm.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.Add(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.ConversionData{Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo})
member.summary: Adds conversion info (edge) to the graph.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.Add(Accord.Extensions.IColor)
member.summary: Registers generic color.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.Add(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.ConversionData{System.Type})
member.summary: Adds depth conversion info (edge) to channel conversion graph.
Removes the paths forbidden by the specified rules.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.GetPath(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo,Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo)
member.summary:
Gets the conversion path.
If the conversion is not allowed or does not exist an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.GetPath(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo,Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo[])
member.summary: Finds the most inexpensive conversion path.

member.summary: Returns if an conversion path requires data copy or not.

member.summary: Gets the cost of the specified conversion path.

member.summary: Converts an image by using specified conversion path.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.Convert(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IImage,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Converters.ColorDepthConverter.ConversionData{Accord.Extensions.Imaging.ColorInfo}},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts and image using conversion path.
member.param: Conversion path. If zero-length source is returned. If null, null value is returned.
Forces to copy data even if the casting is enough
member.returns: Converted image. (may share data with input image if casting is used)

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Image`2
member.summary:
Implements generic image type and provides a basic data manipulation. Other functions are built as extensions making the class light-weight and portable.
Other extensions and satellite assemblies enables multiple interoperability with other libraries such as AForge.NET, OpenCV, EmguCV.

member.summary: Immediately executes the given action on each element in the source sequence.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the sequence
member.param: The action to execute on each element

member.name: M:MoreLinq.MoreEnumerable.MinBy``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Returns the minimal element of the given sequence, based on the given projection.
member.remarks: If more than one element has the minimal projected value, the first one encountered will be returned. This overload uses the default comparer for the projected type. This operator uses immediate execution, but only buffers a single result (the current minimal element).
member.param: Selector to use to pick the results to compare
member.returns: The minimal element, according to the projection.

member.name: M:MoreLinq.MoreEnumerable.MinBy``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1},System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``1})
member.summary: Returns the minimal element of the given sequence, based on the given projection and the specified comparer for projected values.
member.remarks: If more than one element has the minimal projected value, the first one encountered will be returned. This overload uses the default comparer for the projected type. This operator uses immediate execution, but only buffers a single result (the current minimal element).
member.param: Selector to use to pick the results to compare
Comparer to use to compare projected values
member.returns: The minimal element, according to the projection.

member.name: M:MoreLinq.MoreEnumerable.Pairwise``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``0,``1})
member.summary: Returns a sequence resulting from applying a function to each element in the source sequence and its predecessor, with the exception of the first element which is only returned as the predecessor of the second element.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of .
The type of the element of the returned sequence.
member.param: A transform function to apply to each pair of sequence.
member.remarks: This operator uses deferred execution and streams its results.
